QuestData.Title: Calling of the Council
QuestData.Description: <The arcane anomaly turns to address you, speaking in what is clearly Khadgar's voice.>$B$BThough I am loathe to interrupt your fight against the Legion, I must request your help in a matter of... diplomacy. We face a grave threat, and we must be at our full strength to overcome it.$b$bSome will not agree with this position.$b$bPlease join me outside the Violet Citadel in Dalaran. We have repositioned the city to defend the Eastern Kingdoms. You'll find it over Deadwind Pass, above Karazhan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Khadgar in Dalaran at its new location above Deadwind Pass.
QuestData.RewardText: Jaina's reaction was unfortunate, but not unexpected. She has endured so much...$b$bThough it was Garrosh Hellscream who ordered the obliteration of Theramore, she blames all the Horde for her loss. I hope one day she can overcome that hatred.$b$bEnough ruminating. We must prepare the Kirin Tor for war.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Archmage Khadgar in Dalaran
Have Khadgar address the Council of Six
Take the Portal to Dalaran over Karazhan in Stormwind Keep
